name: Artificer
description: Mechanists who use their technological prowess to create devices that protect, heal, and enhance the capabilities of allies, focusing on supportive technology that improves the lives of others.

resource_systems.name: Energy
resource_systems.description: Physical and mental energy that powers invention and device operation
resource_systems.regeneration: 5 per 6 seconds, +8 when operating or repairing supportive devices
mechanics: Energy points are spent to operate devices and power supportive constructs
Some constructs require maintaining focus, consuming energy over time
Short rests restore a significant portion of maximum energy
Depleted energy causes penalties to construct effectiveness and operation
Can be temporarily boosted through inspiration in critical situations
Successful supportive construct operation or healing restores a portion of energy

resource_systems.name: Scrap
resource_systems.description: Raw materials and components that can be salvaged and repurposed for inventions
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when salvaging items or collecting materials, decreases when crafting
mechanics: Increases by 20 when salvaging mechanical items or technological components
Increases by 25 when discovering rare or healing-focused materials
Decreases when crafting supportive constructs or inventions based on complexity
Decreases by 15 per hour when maintaining multiple active healing constructs
Can be spent to create temporary healing devices or repair damaged supportive inventions
Higher Scrap quality increases healing effectiveness and construct durability

resource_systems.name: Automation
resource_systems.description: Measure of your ability to create and control automated systems
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when successfully operating or improving automated supportive systems
mechanics: Increases by 15 when constructs successfully complete healing or protective tasks
Increases by 20 when improving or optimizing supportive automated systems
Decreases by 15 when supportive constructs malfunction or fail assigned tasks
Decreases by 20 when automated healing systems are damaged or destroyed
Can be spent to enhance construct healing performance or execute complex supportive sequences
Higher Automation increases the intelligence and independence of healing constructs

resource_systems.name: Harmonic Resonance
resource_systems.description: Specialized energy that enhances the healing and protective capabilities of constructs
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when successfully healing or protecting allies with technology
mechanics: Increases by 15 when constructs successfully heal or protect allies
Increases by 10 when harmonizing multiple supportive systems together
Decreases by 15 when allies are severely injured despite protective measures
Decreases by 10 when supportive systems conflict or interfere with each other
Can be spent to dramatically enhance healing effectiveness or protective capabilities
At maximum Harmonic Resonance, all supportive constructs operate at peak efficiency

class_mechanics.name: Healing Technology
class_mechanics.description: Specialized knowledge of medical technology and healing devices
effects: Can create constructs that heal injuries and cure ailments
Able to design systems that accelerate natural healing processes
Can analyze injuries and illnesses to develop targeted technological treatments
Presence enhances the effectiveness of all healing technology
Can combine multiple healing technologies for enhanced effectiveness

class_mechanics.name: Protective Systems
class_mechanics.description: Expertise in creating defensive and protective technological systems
effects: Can deploy energy shields and protective barriers
Able to create automated defensive systems that intercept attacks
Can develop personal protection devices for allies
Presence strengthens nearby protective systems
Can analyze threats and rapidly deploy appropriate protective countermeasures

class_mechanics.name: Enhancement Technology
class_mechanics.description: Ability to create devices that temporarily enhance physical and mental capabilities
effects: Can develop systems that boost strength, speed, or endurance
Able to create devices that enhance sensory perception or mental acuity
Can design specialized enhancements for specific tasks or challenges
Presence improves the effectiveness and duration of enhancement devices
Can safely combine multiple enhancements without harmful side effects

class_mechanics.name: Benevolent Innovation
class_mechanics.description: Commitment to using technology for the benefit and protection of others
effects: Gains power bonuses when creating technology that helps or protects others
Able to intuitively understand the needs of allies and develop appropriate solutions
Can inspire hope and confidence in others through technological assistance
Presence naturally calms and reassures those in distress
Can establish trust quickly with those who benefit from supportive technology

signature_abilities.name: Healing Matrix
signature_abilities.description: Deploy an advanced healing system that rapidly restores health to all allies in range
mechanics: Create a 30-meter radius healing field that lasts for 5 minutes
All allies within the field receive continuous healing over time
Critical injuries are stabilized and begin accelerated recovery
Harmful status effects are gradually cleansed from affected allies
The matrix adapts to specific injuries, providing targeted treatment
Costs 100 Energy, 50 Automation, and 75 Harmonic Resonance

signature_abilities.name: Guardian Protocol
signature_abilities.description: Activate a comprehensive defensive system that protects allies from harm
mechanics: Deploy up to 5 autonomous guardian constructs that protect designated allies
Constructs project energy shields that absorb a significant amount of damage
When shields are depleted, constructs physically intercept attacks
System lasts for 10 minutes or until all constructs are destroyed
Constructs can be repaired during operation by spending additional resources
Costs 75 Energy, 30 Scrap, and 50 Harmonic Resonance

signature_abilities.name: Harmonic Augmentation
signature_abilities.description: Temporarily enhance the capabilities of allies through advanced technological augmentation
mechanics: For 3 minutes, deploy personalized enhancement devices to up to 5 allies
Each ally receives customized augmentations based on their needs and abilities
Augmentations can enhance physical attributes, mental capabilities, or special abilities
Effects scale with the ally's level and synergize with their existing abilities
Harmonic resonance between devices creates additional beneficial effects
Costs 50 Energy, 100 Harmonic Resonance, and 25 Automation

skill_trees.name: Path of the Healer
skill_trees.focus: Advanced medical technology and healing systems
key_abilities: Regeneration Matrix: Create devices that dramatically accelerate natural healing
Trauma Response: Deploy emergency medical constructs that stabilize critical injuries
Purification Systems: Develop technology that cleanses toxins and cures diseases

skill_trees.name: Path of the Guardian
key_abilities: Energy Barrier: Create powerful force fields that block incoming damage
Threat Response: Develop automated systems that intercept and neutralize attacks
Sanctuary Field: Generate a protected area where allies can safely recover

skill_trees.name: Path of Enhancement
skill_trees.focus: Technology that improves and augments capabilities
key_abilities: Physical Augmentation: Create devices that enhance strength, speed, and endurance
Mental Enhancement: Develop technology that improves cognition and perception
Ability Amplifier: Design systems that magnify and refine existing talents

advancement_requirements.skill_points: At least 15 points in the Construct Specialist skill tree
advancement_requirements.alignment: Must maintain Good alignment for at least 10 levels
challenges: Use technology to save lives in a critical situation
Create a construct that successfully protects others from harm

effects: Wisdom increased by 5
Healing constructs operate at 50% increased efficiency
Can analyze injuries and illnesses with perfect accuracy

legendary_items.name: Guardian's Aegis
effects: Constitution increased by 3
Can project a personal energy shield that absorbs significant damage
Guardian Protocol cooldown reduced by 1 day

legendary_items.name: Resonance Amplifier
effects: Harmonic Resonance maximum increased by 50
All supportive constructs operate with 30% increased effectiveness
Can temporarily share the benefits of enhancement devices with nearby allies

lore: Artificers represent the most benevolent path a Mechanist can take, having dedicated their technological genius to creating devices and constructs that heal, protect, and enhance the capabilities of others. These compassionate innovators have transcended ordinary supportive technology to develop sophisticated systems that can dramatically improve the lives of those around them, from healing critical injuries to providing protection from otherwise deadly threats. The path to becoming an Artificer requires not only exceptional technical knowledge and construct design skills but also a genuine desire to help others and a deep understanding of the needs of those they seek to assist. Those who succeed find themselves capable of creating technological marvels that can save lives, protect the innocent, and empower allies to overcome seemingly impossible challenges. Artificers typically serve as support specialists in adventuring parties or as valued members of communities where their healing and protective technologies benefit many. Many establish workshops where they develop increasingly advanced supportive systems and train apprentices to carry on their benevolent work. Some even create mobile laboratories or clinics that travel to areas in need, bringing their technological assistance to those who would otherwise lack access to such advanced help. Their combination of healing technology, protective systems, and enhancement devices makes them invaluable allies in dangerous situations, where their inventions can mean the difference between life and death. Though they may lack the offensive capabilities of more combat-focused classes, the supportive power and versatility of Artificers make them essential team members whose contributions often determine the success of challenging endeavors.
